advancedBuffs.0: Empress-shroom & Enchantress-shroom: Summon Interval → 10s | Enchantress-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.1: Empress-shroom & Enchantress-shroom: Can now summon Odyssey Zombies
advancedBuffs.2: Gatling Doom: No more rest after firing an Ultimate Doom Shell | Gatling Frenzy-shroom Subspecies Unlocked | Effects also apply to Epic variants
advancedBuffs.3: Gatling Doom: Now fires a Ultimate Doom Shell every round instead of every 4th round | Gatling Frenzy-shroom: Now fires an Ultimate Doom Shell every 4 attacks | Effects also apply to Epic variants
advancedBuffs.4: Twin Solar-nut: Click Cost 500 → 200 Sun | Twin Inferno-nut: Healing amount ×2 | Effects also apply to Epic variants
advancedBuffs.5: Twin Solar-nut: Toughness reduces by 10 for each hit instead of 50 | Twin Inferno-nut: Click cost 500 → 200 HP | Twin Inferno-nut Subspecies Unlocked | Effects also apply to Epic variants
advancedBuffs.6: Obsidian Spikerock & Spike-nut: Damage multiplied by 5 | Obsidian Spike-nut Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.7: Obsidian Spikerock & Spike-nut: Gains 95% DMG Reduction
advancedBuffs.8: Phoenix Threepeater: Shots can now pierce infinitely and cause Enflamed explosions upon impact | Phoenix Drone Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.9: Phoenix Threepeater: Enflamed damage bonus 50% → 150%, and regular ignited projectiles can now inflict the debuff
advancedBuffs.10: Gatling Icicle-shroom & Sunburst-shroom: Icicles now pierce infinitely and split into two diagonal icicles upon impact the first five times
advancedBuffs.11: Gatling Icicle-shroom: Damage to Frozen/Chill-immune zombies 4× → 12× | Gatling Sunburst-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.12: Radiant Pot: Upgrade costs from Silver Pots to Golden Pots will not exceed 8k
advancedBuffs.13: Radiant Pot: Coins exceeding the maximum amount will be converted into Sun at a rate of 2:1
advancedBuffs.14: Midas Umbrella: Activates Ultimate automatically if zombies are near | Aegis Umbrella Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.16: Aristocattail: Drone Attack Damage ×3 | Thunder Bunnyon: Summoned Drone is no longer nerfed and fires 60 shots normally
advancedBuffs.17: Aristocattail: Regular Attack Damage ×5 | Thunder Bunnyon: Attack Damage ×3 | Thunder Bunnyon Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.18: Calamity-shroom: All Doom-shroom explosions are now craterless | Avarice-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.19: Calamity-shroom: Now spawns 3 extra Hypnotized Gargantuars and Zombonis when it explodes
advancedBuffs.20: Tycoonwood: 1% Damage increase to Coin projectiles for every 1000 Coins you have
advancedBuffs.21: Tycoonwood: Coin projectiles now deal splash damage
advancedBuffs.22: Pharos Umbrella: Energy Limit ×10, Recovery Speed ×20, Healing Speed ×2 | Boreas Umbrella: Damage in Scatter Mode increases linearly up to ×4, Damage in Focus Mode ×4 | Boreas Umbrella Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.23: Pharos Umbrella: Normal Attack Damage ×3, Explosion Damage ×10, Attack Interval → 2s | Boreas Umbrella: Cryo-beam in Focus Mode now applies Freeze for 1s
advancedBuffs.24: Buck-shroom Squad: Sniper always headshots with a 1/3 chance to trigger rapid-fire, but attack CD increased to 7.5s | Buck-strike Squadron: Attack damage ×3
advancedBuffs.25: Buck-shroom Squad: Flak cannon knockback ×2, splash damage ×3 | Buck-strike Squadron: Attack damage ×3 | Buck-strike Squadron Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.26: Tesla Magnet: Attack Range ×2 | Dyson Magnet: Metal Production CD halved | Dyson Magnet Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.27: Tesla Magnet: Absorbs 3 Metal Objects at once, damage to Giga Trident-nut Zombies or Giga Football-nut Zombies ×3 | Dyson Magnet: Heal amount ×3, extra Metal Object production limit (3 + n/3) → (5 + n/2)
advancedBuffs.28: Grim Arbiter: Seed packet drop is now guaranteed
advancedBuffs.29: Grim Arbiter: When destroying non-insta Odyssey plants with on-death effects, the effect is triggered an additional 4 times
advancedBuffs.30: Big Bang Cherry & Big Crunch Squash: Radiation Zone initial duration increased from 7s to 10s
advancedBuffs.31: Big Bang Cherry & Big Crunch Squash: Explosive cherries and Ultimate Doom Shells have a 1% chance of transforming into Nuclear Debris when they hit zombies | Big Crunch Squash Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.32: Cornveyor Weed & Cornposter Pot: Cornveyor and Cornposter's Butter stun duration ×3 | Cornposter Pot Subspecies Unlocked
advancedBuffs.33: Cornveyor Weed: Now makes zombies on it to continuously slide to the right | Cornposter Pot: Butter Chance for the plant above 50% → 100%
advancedBuffs.34: Omni Pumpkin: On entry, grants all connected Magnetic Plants a Shield equal to 30 × number of Magnetic Plants | Quasar: On entry, resets and grants them an Attack buff of 0.5% × number of Magnetic Plants instead
advancedBuffs.35: Omni Pumpkin & Quasar: Now counts twice towards the number of Magnetic Plants
advancedBuffs.1000: Gloves' cooldown is reduced by 10s, and can now move Mini-bosses
advancedBuffs.1002: Each Sun now gives more value | 5 → 15 → 25 → 50 → 75
advancedBuffs.1003: Gloves' cooldown is halved, and can now move Mini-bosses
advancedBuffs.1006: You now have the option to re-pick your Plant Loadout during the game
advancedBuffs.1007: Zombies take an additional 1800 damage when they take more than 1800 damage (after damage reduction)
advancedBuffs.1011: The freeze time of all zombies is increased by 25%, and the slow rate from chill is increased by 10%
advancedBuffs.1012: Gain 3000 Sun, then double your total amount of Sun after | Maximum Sun 50k → 100k
advancedBuffs.1013: True Cherry Bomb: Explosive cherries will now deal at least 1800 damage and cause Cremator damage
advancedBuffs.1014: Clicking on the same plant when you have it on your Glove will disassemble it | 20 seconds cooldown
advancedBuffs.1015: When two identical plants are placed one above the other (adjacent in the same column), they gain a 50% damage bonus and a 50% damage reduction
advancedBuffs.1016: Hypnotized zombies gain a 500% damage buff and 80% damage reduction (WARNING: Also causes Cherry Newspaper Zombies from Empress/Enchantress-shroom to not lose their newspaper on summon!!)
advancedBuffs.1017: All Meteors' attack cooldowns are halved | Base Meteor DMG increased by 300 for every Magnetar in the field
advancedBuffs.1018: Adds 4 Lumos Levels for the entire field
advancedBuffs.2000: True Doom-shroom: Doom-shroom rounds will now release a craterless Doom-shroom explosion upon impact
advancedBuffs.2002: You can upgrade 1 upgradable Epic Modifier
advancedBuffs.2003: If a Plant Type has dealt the highest total damage on the field, its attacks deal an extra 30% of original damage as true damage
advancedBuffs.2004: After firing 50 times (25 for catapults), plants gain an unlimited attack speed for 1s.
advancedBuffs.2005: Plants gain 1% life steal, applied to the plant with the lowest HP percentage on the field.
advancedBuffs.2006: If a zombie goes undamaged for a set amount of time, the next hit it takes will deal greatly increased damage
advancedBuffs.2007: Each time a Zombie is damaged, the next instance of damage to it is increased by 5% (stackable)
advancedBuffs.2008: You can remove 1 Zombie Modifier from the View Modifier menu
advancedBuffs.3000: When Cherrizilla and Obsidian Tall-nut or their subspecies are both present, Cherrizilla's and its subspecies' attack deals AoE damage and no longer has a max Toughness cap, and Obsidian Tall-nut and its subspecies gains a 90% DMG Reduction
advancedBuffs.3001: If there are at least 10 Magnetars and 10 Helios Cabbages on the field, the Mini Sun summoned by the Helios Cabbage will never disappear and deal 5× damage, and will keep summoning Helios Meteors
advancedBuffs.3002: Gatling Cherrybomber now spreads its shots evenly across three lanes with sine and cosine trajectories, and Infernal Squashwood and its subspecies triggers a full-field Jalapeno effect if it can't plant a Spicy plant.
advancedBuffs.3003: When there are at least 10 Magnetars and 10 Selene Cabbages on the field, Selene's summoned Mini Moon will not disappear, while each Magnetar and Selene will charge a beam into the Mini Moon, which redirects it to target the zombie with the most amount of HP
advancedBuffs.3004: Hail melons from Maelonstrom's Nebula Rifts now deal 6× damage and create Singularities, and Quantum McCornics always lob Ultimate Black Holes. When an Ultimate Black Hole collapses, it also detonates all Singularities to further increase its own damage
advancedBuffs.3005: Click on a reloaded Vulcannon while holding an Epic Twin Inferno-nut with the Glove to make all reloaded Vulcannon on the field perform a synergized attack towards the sky. Every 8th Inferno Shell shot calls down an Inferno Meteor dealing 880× damage, decimating all zombies on the screen
advancedBuffs.3006: When Cherrybomber Drone is placed above Epic Gatling Frenzy-shroom, the more they attack, the more bullets they fire in the next volley. This bonus decays after they stop attacking. WARNING: Will lead to cancerous amounts of projectiles!!
advancedBuffs.4000: Summons an Abyssal Chibi to fight for you. His hammer smash damages both nearby plants and zombies, grants damage reduction to affected plants, and deals increased damage to zombies based on nearby plants' HP. Hammer effects scale with xp level
advancedBuffs.4001: Summons a Mini Striker to fight for you. Every 3s, he moves to the plant with the lowest HP percentage and rallies the area, healing nearby plants and increasing damage taken by zombies. Rally effects scale with xp level
advancedBuffs.4002: Summons a Prototype Iceborg to fight for you.
advancedBuffs.4003: Summons a Baby Jill to fight for you
advancedBuffs.5000: Plants deal +100% to Mini-bosses and Bosses
advancedBuffs.5001: Plants gain a 5% damage bonus for every Zombie Modifier you have
advancedBuffs.5003: Plants deal ×2 damage but receive ×4 damage
advancedBuffs.5004: Seed packets no longer need recharge but each use costs 15× their base Sun + 50% of the player's current Sun
advancedBuffs.6003: Gatling Cherrybomber Mastery I: Cherry and other variants of projectiles' explosion radius +50% and damage +100%
advancedBuffs.6004: Gatling Cherrybomber Mastery II: Cherry and other variants of projectiles' explosion radius -50%  but damage +300%
advancedBuffs.6005: Doominator Mastery I: Frozen zombies take +50% more damage
advancedBuffs.6006: Doominator Mastery II: Hypnotized zombies deal 3× damage
advancedBuffs.6007: Infernal Squashwood Mastery I: Jalapeno effect changes from instant to DoT, dealing 1/3 the original damage 10 times within 1s
advancedBuffs.6008: Infernal Squashwood Mastery II: Grants projectiles +50% damage before igniting them
advancedBuffs.6009: Plants in the fifth column get 50% increased maximum Toughness and 50% damage reduction. Each column to the left reduces damage cap by 10% and increases damage reduction by 10%

ultimateBuffs.1: Cherrizilla & Garlizilla: Devour CD reduced to 15s
ultimateBuffs.2: Gatling Cherrybomber: Explosive cherries from plants ×3 damage
ultimateBuffs.3: Gatling Cherrybomber & Cherrybomber Drone: Attack Speed +100%
ultimateBuffs.4: Doominator: Attack speed ×3; Thornminator attack damage ×3; Iceclaw Zombie attack damage ×3
ultimateBuffs.5: Doominator: Zombies will take 30% of their current health as damage when unfrozen
ultimateBuffs.6: Infernal Squashwood & Sparkwood: Projectiles required to spawn a Spicy plant are halved
ultimateBuffs.7: Infernal Squashwood & Sparkwood: Ignites the lane immediately when spawning a Spicy plant is not possible
ultimateBuffs.9: Magnetar: Lv1: Base damage ×2 and damage cap (300) increased to 3000; Lv2: Base damage ×3, damage cap removed
ultimateBuffs.10: Shroomageddon: Explosion damage on death → 1M | Atomheart Plantern: Lumos boost on death ×3
ultimateBuffs.11: Shroomageddon & Atomheart Plantern: Now immune to Cherry and Jack-in-the-Box explosions. After resisting 10k points of explosive damage, triggers a Doom-shroom explosion
ultimateBuffs.12: Wither-pult & Rot-pult: Spread-fire is now guaranteed
ultimateBuffs.13: Wither-pult & Rot-pult: Lv1: Stacking Poison points will immediately poison the zombie and Poison Value Cap → 120; Lv2: Poison Value Cap removed
ultimateBuffs.14: Cob-literator: Main Blast damage ×4 | Panmelonium: Damage ×4
ultimateBuffs.16: Obsidian Tall-Nut & Obsidian Mine: Max HP Cap ×3
ultimateBuffs.17: Obsidian Tall-nut & Obsidian Mine: Can now absorb the damage directed to the two plants on its left and right
ultimateBuffs.18: Charmatron: Hypnotization HP threshold increased from 60% to 100% | Captivator Pumpkin: Damage to captured hypnotized Zombies halved
ultimateBuffs.19: Charmatron: Attack Interval → 1s, Charge Level will not drop below 2 and can be fed metal to reach Charge Level 3 for 5 mins | Captivator Pumpkin: Charge Level 3 unlocked
ultimateBuffs.20: Apeacalypse Minigun & Railgun: Attack Power ×3 and Knockback Strength ×3
ultimateBuffs.21: Apeacalypse Minigun & Railgun: Lv1: Defense increases as Toughness decreases. Below 500 HP, becomes immune to damage under 1k; Lv2: Below 500 HP, base damage ×2
ultimateBuffs.22: Helios Cabbage: When Sun exceeds 15k, each of Helios Cabbage's attacks consumes 0.5% of the excess to boost projectile damage by 20 per 1 Sun spent | Selene Cabbage: Damage increased by 3× per Lumos Level
ultimateBuffs.23: Helios Cabbage: Mini Sun deals 3× damage | Selene Cabbage: Mini Moon heals 3×
ultimateBuffs.25: Laser Pumpkin: Wingmen and Drone DMG ×3
ultimateBuffs.26: Napalm-shroom: Charging speed and max charging duration ×3
ultimateBuffs.27: Napalm-shroom: Inferno lasts twice as long
ultimateBuffs.28: Kelptain Goldbeard: Plants deal 5% more attack damage for every 1000 points owned (up to +300%)
ultimateBuffs.29: Kelptain Goldbeard: The Odyssey shop now has a 30% discount on Modifiers
ultimateBuffs.30: Quantum McCornics: Ultimate Black Hole can absorb all projectiles
ultimateBuffs.31: Quantum McCornics: Ultimate Black Hole's absorption radius ×2
ultimateBuffs.32: Boreal Lifereaver: Boreal reaper saws now last for 15s
ultimateBuffs.33: Boreal Lifereaver: Healing is no longer split among plants
ultimateBuffs.35: Tyrannoflora Lux: Provides 2 Lumos Level to a 5×5 area during digestion
ultimateBuffs.36: Vulcannon: Volcanic Bombs Damage ×3 | Kaledera Eruptor: Pyro Cabbages Damage ×3
ultimateBuffs.37: Vulcannon: Now triggers Thermonuclear Detonations when main blasts strike Cherry Bombs or Jalapenos | Kaledera Eruptor: 10% chance to trigger Cherry Bomb and Jalapeno effects at the barrel position and ignore the target limit of 10
ultimateBuffs.38: Princess Solarnova: When a solar shot hits a zombie, it cause nearby projectiles to explode as well
ultimateBuffs.39: Princess Solarnova: Energy cap ×3, Sun production amount after storage overflow ×3
ultimateBuffs.40: Maelonstrom: Nebula Rift now focuses on the zombie with the least HP for the first half of the barrage
ultimateBuffs.41: Maelonstrom: Cryo-melon damage ×6, but with decreased splash radius
ultimateBuffs.44: Scylla Leviathan: Tangler minions can drown up to 3 zombies (or deal ×3 damage), and each zombie drowned rewards 10 energy stacks
ultimateBuffs.45: Scylla Leviathan: Fires 3 base attack projectiles at once
ultimateBuffs.46: Cryolina Reaper: Soul charge cap increased to 10, now gains 1 soul charge whenever a Mini-boss dies
ultimateBuffs.47: Cryolina Reaper: When using a soul charge, also grants 1s of invincibility to all plants

unlocks.1: Unlock Gatling Cherrybomber: Gatling Cherry + Explode-o-shooter
unlocks.3: Unlock Infernal Squashwood: Spicy Squash + Infernowood
unlocks.8: Unlock Obsidian Tall-nut: Frost Tall-nut + Flame Tall-nut
unlocks.10: Unlock Apeacalypse Minigun: Titan Pea Turret + Spicicle
unlocks.11: Unlock Helios Cabbage: Solar-pult + Golden Cabbage
unlocks.12: Unlock Laser Pumpkin: Carrier Pumpkin + Magnet Blover
unlocks.14: Unlock Kelptain Goldbeard: Twin Marigold > Hydra Kelp
unlocks.16: Unlock Boreal Lifereaver: Spruce Supershooter + Snowbloom Spruce
unlocks.17: Unlock Tyrannoflora Lux: Lumos Angler > Chomper Maw
unlocks.18: Unlock Vulcannon: Pyro Cannon + Pepper Popper
unlocks.19: Unlock Princess Solarnova: Torchflower + Golden Sunflower
unlocks.20: Unlock Maelonstrom: Winter Melon + Chrono Melon
unlocks.21: Unlock Prometheus Liontail: Flame Cattail + Pepper Popper

debuffs.0: Gatling Cherry Newspaper Zombie: Ability to walk through plants when its newspaper's broken
debuffs.1: Gatling Cherry Newspaper Zombies will be immune to all status effects
debuffs.2: Giga Football-nut Zombie: Bites now disable plant healing for 1s
debuffs.3: Giga Football-nut Zombie: Bites weaken plants, making them receive 3× damage for 1s
debuffs.4: Sharkmarine: Movement speed is now doubled
debuffs.6: Kirov Zomppelin: Immunity to Blovers | Increased Movement Speed
debuffs.7: Kirov Zomppelin: Drones' HP Increased by 50 times
debuffs.8: Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie: Will always explode regardless of its state, and its charging time is reduced by 90%
debuffs.9: Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie: Jack-in-the-Box-type Zombies affected by the explosion will turn into Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombies
debuffs.10: Giga Trident-nut Zombie: Tridents deal 5× damage
debuffs.11: Giga Trident-nut Zombie: Now ignores Umbrella-type plants and targets random plants to attack
debuffs.12: Superstar Zombie: Can now summon Super Dancing Pole Vaulters
debuffs.13: Superstar Zombie: Will now phase through plants when sliding in
debuffs.14: Undying Wraith: Explosion damage will now ignore immunities by Joker Pumpkins and other relevant plants
debuffs.15: Undying Wraith: Dash CD reduced | Attack Power Greatly Increased
debuffs.16: Trident Hwacha: Now immune to most status effects and throws 5× as many tridents
debuffs.17: All your existing plants have a 1/3 chance to perish (applied once)
debuffs.18: Your Sun will be reset to 0
debuffs.19: Double the health of all zombies
debuffs.20: Increase the maximum limit of zombies per wave to 100
debuffs.21: Michael Zomboni: Spawns Every Round | Spawns Superstar Zombies when it dies
debuffs.23: Abyssal Gargantuar: Spawns Dr. Zomboss when it dies
debuffs.24: Pozeidon will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.25: Ultra Mecha-nut will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.26: Giga Football Striker will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.27: Skystrider Mecha will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.28: Jackson Worldwide will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.29: Professor Cherryz will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.30: Bungee Zombies have a chance to drop an Odyssey Zombie in the 4th column or further to the right and will gain 90% DMG Reduction
debuffs.31: Queen Jill-in-the-Box will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.32: Zombies have a chance to revive to full HP on death
debuffs.33: You can have no more than 120 plants on the field
debuffs.34: Alpha Assassin Squad will also appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.35: Alpha Assassin Squad can now recover from being incapacitated infinitely
debuffs.36: Trident Hwacha will attack in advance
debuffs.37: Giga Football Archduke will appear as a Mini-boss
debuffs.38: Frost Legion Frayer Disc: Dissolver Beams now target the farthest plant within range
debuffs.39: Frost Legion Frayer Disc: Siphon Drainer's range: 1 Tile → 3×3 Area
debuffs.40: Element-infused Gargantuar: Appearance no longer matters, has the extra abilities of all four affinities at once
debuffs.41: Element-infused Gargantuar: Appearance no longer matters, has the debuff immunities of all four affinities at once
debuffs.42: Trident Jugger-nut Gargantuar: Trident Reload Speed ×3
debuffs.44: Gatling Doom Newspaper Zombie will appear
debuffs.45: Giga Mecha-nut: For the first 50 hits, all zombies take only 1 damage
debuffs.46: Giga Mecha-nut: For the first 100 hits, zombies gain 0.1s of damage immunity after each hit
debuffs.47: All healing and shields on Plants are reduced by 50%
debuffs.48: Plants lose max HP equal to 10% of the damage received (capped at 40% and resets between rounds) when taking damage
debuffs.49: Your Points will be reset to 0

investmentBuffs.0: Plants do 40% more damage in the first 50% of the round
investmentBuffs.1: At the end of each round, gain 50 points for every type of plant that dealt 0 damage this round
investmentBuffs.2: At the end of each round, gain 1000 points and 5% more max HP for all your plants if none of your plants reached 0 HP in this round
investmentBuffs.3: Turn all plants on the lawn into random plants, gain 1000 points immediately and the Glove will have no CD in this round
investmentBuffs.4: Immediately gain 10 random Odyssey plants as seed packets
investmentBuffs.5: Every time a Mini-boss is defeated, all plants heal for 10% of their max HP
investmentBuffs.6: All non-mini-boss Zombies have 10% less HP
investmentBuffs.8: Every wave, 1500% base damage is dealt to the zombie with the most HP
investmentBuffs.9: The plant type that deals the most damage deals an additional 25% damage
investmentBuffs.10: At the start of every round, your plants gain 3% damage reduction for every type of non-Odyssey plant on the lawn, up to 30%
investmentBuffs.11: At the start of every round, the 6 plants with the most damage gain a 20% damage boost
investmentBuffs.12: You gain 6 extra rerolls in the Shop if you didn't buy anything from the last visit
investmentBuffs.1000: Shovel all of your plants, but your Sun is doubled, and at the start of every round all plants gain Shield equal to the total amount of Sun cost of the plants shoveled
investmentBuffs.1001: Shovel all of your plants, but your Sun is doubled, and Seed packets have no CD in this round
investmentBuffs.1002: Your teams gain an 18% chance to crit
investmentBuffs.1003: At the start of every round, your plants gain 3% more HP and 6% more attack damage for every type of plant on the lawn
investmentBuffs.1004: The plant type that deals the most damage deals an additional 40% damage and your teams also do 10% more damage
investmentBuffs.1005: At the start of every round, the leftmost regular plant in every lane gains a 150% attack speed boost, but at the start of every wave, they receive damage equal to 1000% of their max HP
investmentBuffs.1006: At the start of every round, the leftmost regular plant on every lane gains a damage boost equal to 0.1% of the rightmost regular plant's max HP, and the rightmost regular plant gains max HP equal to 1000% of the leftmost regular plant's damage
investmentBuffs.1007: At the start of every round, your teams gain a 25% chance to crit, and 30% reduced max HP
investmentBuffs.1008: Your teams gain a 10% chance to crit. At the start of every round, that chance is increased by 1%
investmentBuffs.1009: Your teams gain a 10% attack damage boost. At the start of every round, if there are 200 or more plants in your teams, all plants gain an additional 50% attack damage boost
investmentBuffs.1010: At the start of every round and now, gain 1500 points and an extra reroll
investmentBuffs.1011: At the start of every round, promote a random non-Odyssey plant to Tier 2
investmentBuffs.1012: You gain a Plant Giftbox every time you perform a fusion
investmentBuffs.1013: Your plants do 40% more damage in the last 50% of the round
investmentBuffs.2000: Your teams gain a 25% chance to crit. They also gain a chance equal to 30% of their crit chance to reduce any incoming damage to 1
investmentBuffs.2001: Your teams gain 25% damage reduction, and crit chance equal to their damage reduction rate
investmentBuffs.2002: At the start of every round, every plant has a 50% chance to gain a 100% attack damage boost
investmentBuffs.2003: Your teams gain a permanent 8% attack damage boost every time a Mini-boss is defeated
investmentBuffs.2004: At the start of every round, promote a random non-Odyssey plant to Tier 3
investmentBuffs.2005: Increase your teams' crit chance by 30%. If the crit chance is above 100%, crit damage is increased by 40%
investmentBuffs.2006: A super rare Endoflame that holds a ton of Points appears
investmentBuffs.2007: Immediately gain 5000 points. From now on, you gain 3000 points if you enter into the next round without buying anything from the Shop
investmentBuffs.2008: You have a 45% chance to gain an extra reroll when you reroll
investmentBuffs.2009: At the start of every round, gain 2000 points.
investmentBuffs.2010: At the start of each round, gain a Stellar Imitator. If used on a plant with a Stellar form, it becomes that plant's Stellar variant
investmentBuffs.2011: Gain 500 points every time you reroll
investmentBuffs.2012: Deplete all of your current points. For every 1000 points depleted, your plants gain a 1% chance to crit
investmentBuffs.2013: In this round, you gain 10000 points and win the round if a zombie enters your house
